channel.title: Projects on Alfonso Magallon
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Alfonso Magallon

item.title: Project 3: Full Factorial DOE
item.description: In this project, my goal was to explore and analyze a data set with the factors of concentration, temperature, and catalyst to see its affect on yield (response variable). Link to complete project on GitHub

item.title: Project 2: Predicting Heart Failure
item.description: In this project, my goal was to explore a clinical dataset to create a machine learning model that can predict patient heart failure survival. By exploring the data, the aim will be to select the most important features that can be used for a machine learning algorithm. Different machine learning algorithms will be created in order to evaluate the best performing model. Link to complete project on GitHub

item.title: Project 1: Retail Price Optimization
item.description: For this project my goal was to explore a dataset containing information on retail pricing in order to identify a method to optimize a balance of retail pricing and customer attraction. Data was explored by analyzing relationships and creating visualizations to easily identify trends. I looked into the retail categories to compare them to each other as well as to other retail competitors. I used a Decision Tree regression model to make pricing predictions and to compare to actual pricing.
